## Checklist

Before submitting, please verify:

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to see if this has been answered
- [ ] I have checked the documentation and examples
- [ ] I have provided enough context for others to understand my question
- [ ] This is a question about library usage (not a bug report or feature request)

---

**Note**: For general discussion or open-ended questions, consider using [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/[org]/IEEE_1588_2019/discussions) instead. This issue tracker is best for specific, answerable questions.

For urgent production support, see the Operations Manual (Section 4.4) for emergency contact information.
